intro: Threhold tBTC is a wrapped bitcoin token minted on Ethereum via the Threshold network. It is bridged to Solana via a custom Wormhole implementation.

risk_factors: Has mint authority - tokens can be minted

authority_analyses.mint_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='2PfR3xUdMS8xHUhE9H47dy2Ro3Ww9agP5GdnNoKj3Vtf', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Mint unlimited tokens', 'Change mint authority to any address', 'Burn tokens from any account', 'Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': []})
authority_analyses.update_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='2PfR3xUdMS8xHUhE9H47dy2Ro3Ww9agP5GdnNoKj3Vtf', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': []})

key_findings: No freeze authority is associated with the token contract.
Bridge is an implementation of Wormhole. The implementation is governed by 87MEvHZCXE3ML5rrmh5uX1FbShHmRXXS32xJDGbQ7h5t, a 4/8 multisig.
Signers in the 87MEvHZCXE3ML5rrmh5uX1FbShHmRXXS32xJDGbQ7h5t multisig are delegates a part of the Threshold DAO.
recommendations: Consider decentralizing mint_authority - current setup is high risk
Consider decentralizing update_authority - current setup is high risk

key_findings: No freeze authority is associated with the token contract.
